metadata.name: PEOPLE_001
metadata.description:
◆CONCEPT
On this work, physical body = "**here**" world & cognition = "**there**" world come across.

This is not real, but REAL. 
We captured this by means of "cognition printing" we invented.

This, not "**here**" nor "**there**" world, is what we call "**+there**" world. We beleive in the uniquie value of this world.

click [here](https://www.slideshare.net/ssusere88d45/athandbookv1) for more info.

◆BENEFITS
**for bidders**: limited ver. of NFT art work will be given.
**for th 1st holder**: S/he can be motiv of the new +here peole work.


*only with mutual understanding beforehand.
*if the 1st holder does not utilise the benefit, the 2nd holder will have the chance.
*some of royalty will be shared with the holder who becomes a motiv. The royalty portion will be decided by AT.

◆NOTE
If you buy an AT's NFT, you do not receive commercial rights in the corresponding artwork.
